game.name: Russian Life Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 러시아인의 가장 현실적인 시뮬레이터. 출생시 퇴직금을 모으고, 병을 모아 생존하고 흥미 진진한 평생 이야기의 일부가됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The most realistic simulator of the life of a Russian person. Collect pension from birth, collect bottles to survive and become part of an exciting life-long story.

reviewHighlights.text: Simulation game in which players experience the life of a Russian character from birth to old age, collecting pensions and bottles as currency, develo...
mined the shit out of my gpu 10/10 recommend
